First Honors.criteria: Top 5% of the college based on semestral QPI
First Honors.other_requirements: No failing grades, no INC, no disciplinary cases

Second Honors.criteria: Top 10% of the college based on semestral QPI
Second Honors.other_requirements: No failing grades, no INC, no disciplinary cases

deans_lister.description: Recognition for students who achieve semestral honors
deans_lister.benefits: Listed in the Dean's List posted by the school

eligibility_notes: Honors are based on cumulative QPI at time of graduation
Students must complete degree within prescribed period
Full-time enrollment required for semestral honors
source: Ateneo College Student Handbook Vol 1, 2025 Edition
